description: React component 'Charts' that renders expense data visualizations using chart.js. It creates a donut chart for expenses by category and a line chart for expenses over time, based on the provided 'expenses' prop.
external_methods: Chart as ChartJS, ArcElement, Tooltip, Legend, LineElement, PointElement, LinearScale, CategoryScale

methods.name: Charts({ expenses = [] })
methods.description: React functional component that displays expense charts, memoizing category and timeline data for rendering.
